name: Untitled FPS (GrizonII)
description:
Arcadey first person shooter made in PICO-8.

Waves of enemies will spawn in around you; charge up your attack to defend against them! 

Controls (also listed in game):

  • Arrow keys or ESDF to walk. Game begins only when you begin moving.
    • (apologies for the odd ESDF layout there; just using the default player 2 layout from PICO-8)
  • Move mouse to aim.
    • Note mouse use is thus required.
  • Hold primary mouse button or X to charge attacks, release to fire.
    • Different levels of charge perform different attacks as indicated at the bottom of the screen.
    • Note a point of health is restored for each enemy defeated.
  • Press Enter to pause.
    • The HUD and a minimap can be toggled via the pause menu.

Currently lacking in sound but should otherwise be fully playable.
